channel.title: Surfing on D U N K
channel.description: Recent content in Surfing on D U N K

item.title: How-to: A better method to transport a surfboard on a bike without a rack (Patent NA25396 :P)
item.description: The problem I live in San Francisco, and our city beach is exactly 4.7 miles away from my apartment in Haight (yay!). It’s a beautiful bike ride, but it’s slightly far than I can carry my board under my arm on my bike (boo), and so far if I wanted to go surf I’d either have to rely on my friend Jake (who has a car) to also go right now, or take the N-Line on Muni which is unreliable (especially on weekends) (boo!
